data.name: Peace for Ukraine
data.detailed_description:
Peace for Ukraine is a military-shooter reenactment portraying an imaginary series of accelerations among Russian and Ukraine which brings about open clash in the late winter of 2022. As Russian powers move into a Ukrainian area the Ukrainians give a valiant effort to safeguard their country against a mathematically and mechanically unrivaled enemy. Occasions encompassing the intrusion make NATO send its high level quick organization powers to really look at the Russian development. A fierce situation, without a doubt, yet one which permits you to get a brief look at what's truly going on with full range contemporary close to peer strategic fighting.

Features:
• You can buy three type of units.
• When you destroy enemy units you receive money.
• You can special abilities to request: Rocket Strike (which make AOE damage to enemies) or Medical Kit airdrop
• Who first reach opposite side and destroy vehicle with flag wins.

data.short_description: Military shooter about Ukrainian / Russia crisis 2022

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3300
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX680
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5500
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
